body:
I will put together a test shortly.


I'm not sure how much more simply I can answer the directory question, but I'll try.

I agree, it makes no sense for each_logical_path to attempt to work directly on directories.

The existing patch takes a list full of filenames, and turns some of them into directory names.  It takes a list of sensible elements, and changes some to make no sense.  It is a bug.

My patch takes directory names and turns them into filenames -- it takes elements that are passed in that "make no sense" and attempts to make sense of them.

The latter is the behavior described at http://guides.rubyonrails.org/asset_pipeline.html#using-index-files -- assets can be referred to/asked for by directory, and Rails/Sprockets will attempt to use index.* files inside such directories.
